messages.message: is it unreasonable to request all of the instabase modules? If it is: instabase.ocr

We only add those modules to notebook which do not have dependencies on instabase code due to a number of reasons (notebooks sometime run in a different cluster, tight coupling with instabase code,â€¦). Unfortunately, `instabase.ocr` is dependent on a variety of instabase modules. To be able to add `instabase.ocr`, the owner(s) of `shared-utils/py-utils/ocr-client-lib` would first need to decouple it or add a corresponding decoupled copy  to `public-libs/...` . cc: @Hari
Thanks Mohit for the details! @Charles Unfortunately it's impossible at the moment to include this module cos of all the dependencies it has with various components.
@Hari  @Mohit  Bummer, thanks for explaining! Will use other methods to test code that imports instabase.ocr (and if you have any suggestions would appreciate it)
